scripts.copy:docs: cpy "src/*.html" docs --flat && cpy dist/** docs/dist && cpy img/** docs/img && cpy src/js/** docs/js
scripts.fixpaths:docs: replace-in-file "\.\./dist/" "dist/" docs/*.html && replace-in-file "\.\./img/" "img/" docs/*.html && replace-in-file "\.\./js/" "js/" docs/*.html && replace-in-file "href=\"\.\/output.css\"" "href=\"dist/output.css\"" docs/*.html
scripts.deploy:docs: npm run build:css && npm run clean:docs && npm run copy:docs && npm run copy:index && npm run fixpaths:docs && npm run nojekyll
